Had an excellent stay at PC Rawalpindi. The hospitality and service were outstanding throughout. A big thanks to the housekeeping team for their great attention to detail and friendly attitude — they made sure everything was always clean and comfortable.

Special appreciation to Mr. Akbar for his exceptional cooperation and professionalism. He went above and beyond to ensure a pleasant experience. Truly grateful for the warm hospitality — highly recommended!

Well last I visited this hotel it was 1988 and the name was intercontinental , it's a world standard hotel , excellent management , excellent services , very convenient access and easy location. Service wise I have no comments and hesitations to recommend the stay in hotel , except the sitting area outside the hotel lobby , the mosquitos were so much that they made it difficult to sit there, I would request the hotel managed to kindly make necessary arrangements to get rid of mosquitoes , I visited this hotel to meet my cousin jaleel Khan who came from America and was staying in this hotel , it was 21st of October at around 6.0 pm

The service recieved was awful!!!

Aloy of the staff all have a bad attidude. They only talk to you nicely if you dress to impress, actually think they are something special because they work for a mediocre hotel they thing is massive, maybe is for Pakistan!

So we arrived and requested a taxi to go darbar they told us all the roads were closed it was a no go area. We walked out and easily found a rickshaw that took us straight there.

Then I happen to forget my laptop in the room! I flew out to London.

Once they found it, because i couldnt remember the room the staff were being funny needlessley! I then requested it be sent to london I will pay the cost , given we are in the 21st centrury, surely this is not too much to ask.

I was shocked to find out this was against their policy, they were so unhelpful. I raised a complaint they said they would contact me back via wattapp after they have spoken to managemnt. A whole day passed no one contacted me, so I called back to find out no progress had been made. The guy assured me he would contact me via wattapp and did not. After constant chasing i gave up.

I arranged for my uncle to to PC hotel to pick up the laptop he travelled 3 hours to get there, the staff were rude to him and made him wait 2 hours. Made no contact with me, for one hour whilst he was there and told him to just wait. Once they did we arranged for the laptop to handed over but that toom another hour!

Who do these people think they are, avoid this hotel!

Management, this is a reflection of you, your team member gave poor service, when someone is stuck like that any other hotel in this 21st century would go out of their way to help, let alone the attidude of your staff, how dare you make my uncle wait 2 hours with such awful attidude!!!

Avoid this hotel at all cost!

Pearl continental  location is quite central, on Mall Road, which is a prestigious and commercial area of Rawalpindi. Known as 5 Star Hotel.  Several in-house restaurants offering a mix of international and local cuisine. Bukhara, Taipan are popular dinning outlets.

Due to heavy traffic and the densely populated surroundings, it may not feel very peaceful or comfortable.

It was a pleasurable experience. The rooms were clean and lovely, and the washroom was fresh, equipped with clean towels and all necessary accessories. The bed was comfortable and provided a relaxing stay.

The housekeeping associates truly made our visit memorable they were amazing. The restaurants were clean and offered a good variety of dishes. The lobby was grand and shining like a mirror.

Although the room furniture was of an old style, it was neat and clean and well-maintained. I strongly recommend PC Rawalpindi to my family and friends for their stay.

Uzma, Supervisor of House Keeping,has been wonderful and absolutely fabulous in carrying out her duties in the most cordial , courteous and professional way.  I stayed here for a week and during this time I found Uzma and her team (trainee: Hasnain) to be most reliable and dependable. Both are of excellent character. I state this based on my personal experience of leaving the safe unlocked by mistake. However on my return I found everything exactly where I had left it. I was pleasantly  astonished at the moral excellence of the PC staff Supervisor Uzma and her trainee, Hasnain. Wonderful experience overall. Ayesha and Shafiq of Marco Polo, Hayat of the Executive Lounge, Tayyaba, Akbar, and all duty managers , Awais the driver all made my stay comfortable and were quick to address my concerns. ***While staying here, do not hesitate to communicate your requests politely and you'd always find PC Staff cooperating with you. Special kudos to all women staff employed at the hotel.

My stay at the Pearl Continental Hotel in Rawalpindi was nothing short of exceptional. The hotel's prime location in the city's heart makes it incredibly convenient, but what truly sets it apart is the impeccable standard of service and hospitality.

The staff, from the front desk to the restaurant team, are incredibly courteous and professional. They go out of their way to ensure every guest feels welcome and comfortable. The check-in and check-out process was smooth, and any requests were handled with great efficiency.

The rooms are a perfect blend of classic elegance and modern comfort. They are well-maintained, clean, and spacious, providing a perfect retreat after a long day. The facilities are top-notch, including the a pool and a business center, making it an ideal choice for a variety of travelers.

The dining experience is another highlight. The hotel's restaurants offer a fantastic variety of local and international cuisines, with a breakfast buffet that is particularly praised for its quality and wide selection.

While the hotel has a long history, its commitment to excellence remains strong. The PC Hotel Rawalpindi is more than just a place to stay; it's a destination that offers a truly luxurious and memorable experience. It's a testament to timeless hospitality and a gem in the city.

recently had the pleasure of staying at the Pearl Continental Hotel Rawalpindi, and it was a truly luxurious experience. The hotel's location on Mall Road was perfect for exploring the city, and I was impressed by the elegant lobby and friendly staff who greeted me upon arrival.
My room was spacious, beautifully decorated and well cleaned with all the modern amenities I could ask for. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and I had a great night's sleep. I also enjoyed the stunning city views from my window.
